00025 #define GSEC1970 11676096000.00 /* Gregorian seconds equivalent for 19700101 */
00026                                 /* # seconds between Carl Johnson's chron3   */
00027                                 /* time 0 and 1970-01-01 00:00:00.0 GMT      */
00028

00032         int day;

00036 };
